content.label: Not a terrible game but the physics are awful.
This is Tom from P-Town. Just want to say this game is GEM of a racer it's fun and challenging at the same time. Thanks from Tom.

This is one of the best racers I've played on iOS. The controls are spot-on, and fully customizable. In-app purchases easily go unnoticed, in other words, it's not hard to earn money and advance just by playing the game.

I've gotten my money's worth out of this one for sure. Great job, guys.
Please please put I'm some sort of a time trial thing where there aren't any other cars to run into. I wanna get fast times and all but I keep running into the slow cars.

title.label: Best top down racer on iOS.

content.label:
Just got my new iPhone 6 and excited i get to relive this game again. Everything about it is perfect. By far the best top down racer on iOS.

Looks great on my iPhone 6!
Great freaking game

The saving problem is fixed, but that doesn't solve the money I wasted in the in store problem. I wasted around 4 dollars upgrading my car etc. I honestly don't trust buying any upgrades from this game again. (It's a fun games though)
After "save fix", the graphics look like Playstation 1 quality.  What the heck happened?
got my save back awsome, now the graphics are shot. ill wait till Reckless 3 is released this week.
Great game but won't save progress
The game is realy good but none of my gameplay is saved. I have to create a new character every time I open the app

Perfect racing game, best on the App Store, other than the fact when you update to iOS 8 you loose all of your progress, so the countless hours and almost $75 I've put into this game are now worthless, never playing a game by polarbit again unless this gets fixed
I got on the app to play and all my stuff is missing. I had to restart the game and when I was coming back on all the stuff I did to redo it was gone. Please fix the problem
So, after the iOS update, I've noticed that me, as long as a lot of others are frustrated that, if you close the game now, you'll lose all of your progress?! Fix this.

Wow best game ever!!!!!!!
However !!! The game does not save progress anymore 
What a drag !!!?
I used to love this game, but I'm not playing it anymore (until an update).  TWICE I've lost all my cars (and progress) ever since iOS 8 Update.  Do you KNOW how frustrating that is?  FIX IT!!

I really enjoy the physics and overall gameplay, but I have lost my profile twice now and having to restart the game yet again has basically ruined the experience for me. If they can overcome the technical difficulties, this will be a great game.
The game don't save my progress. Must be fixed.
Games really fun but won't let me save my game for some reason. I hope they could fix my problem.Plus for some reason it keeps crashing so at this point I wish I wouldn't of wasted my money.
Since the IOS 8 update the game resets everything when you stop playing and reopen it. Please fix the issue.
This game looks just as good as reckless racing 1 but I can't play it because every time I try I get kicked off please fix this!!!!!!!!!
I love it

Tilt steering on this version is pitiful. I have tried to adjust the sensitivity to no avail... There is way to much null zone off center..   I can tilt my iPad almost 15 degrees and the car just begins to turn all be it very slowly..  Tilted around  20 degrees and the car snaps violently into oversteer and all I do is fishtail..  Driving straight is almost impossible as you come out of a turn.. Sad really because this version has great tracks and the ability to upgrade and paint your car is brilliant..  I have turned the difficulty way down and stuck with it long enough to purchase the baja truck and rally car and max out all their upgrades thinking maybe the handling would improve with the better cars.. Nope, they all exhibit the same characteristics.. Fix the steering physics or add the ability to adjust the null zone and linearity and I'll gladly give it five stars..
The racing is ok, but try having the cars react more realistically when they get hit.

title.label: Amazing will there be a third

content.label: Make another reckless racing this was so much fun
This game has awesome graphics I love It please make a reckless racing 3 they just get better every time!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title.label: The buttons ARE WAY TOO SMALL

content.label: Seriously this needs to be fixed...I can't be the only one who has trouble with them alllllll the time.  If they responded to touch farther above and below then it would probably be all good.  Please fix this, love the game!

title.label: Good, but a few needed changes

content.label: I really like playing it and it was well worth the money, but a few needed improvements: when you pause the race, half the time it will crash the app, when you hit the home button the app will completely restart when you reopen it, instead of going back to the race. There is also the fps drop when an alert slides down, which really interrupts the experience, and the buttons need to be farther apart so that they aren't unintentionally hit. Thanks and good job so far (btw: reckless racing 3... When?)
They need to make a Nascar game like this ! They would have the road courses down. They would have to make the speedways fun ! I'm not talking 300 laps, but give me some Nascar please !! I'd buy it !

I love reckless racing 2 but you guys at Polarbit should make another reckless. I only gave four because it's been about 1 and a half years now.   
    I know that you guys can do.

title.label: Love it, super arcade racing fun!

content.label: Nice graphics, camera angle makes the racing much more interesting and precise, and some of the soundtrack is awesome.
this second generation is very challenging at every level.  great fun.  the next gen wish list:  damage counter, more upgrades that are more important than others depending on tactics.
Just played this again for the fourth time. Still love it. Please make another one! When is Reckless Racing 3 coming out?!

title.label: Looks fun, but how to play without buying more?

content.label:
I know the developer only wants your wallet with "in App purchases", but PLEASE give a "quick race" option. I paid for the game, now let me play!

Found it, only available in non-multiplayer mode. Controls however are REALLY TERRIBLE! Seems still the best game for 2013 & 2014 is Clash of Clans.

Speechless. Reckless Racing 2 is one of my favorite games on the App Store. I think it's one of the best of all time. It's really challenging, specially when you play with your friends in Game Center. The graphic is great, maps are awesome. I have looked so far for such a racing app and I'm glad I have found this game. It's definitely worth the money. Don't miss the game if you like racing ...
So much better than the first reckless racing.
Fun game but crashes to much
Enjoy

I guess it was a known issue.  Back to 5

I purchased this hoping the devs would have figured out how to up the frame rate which was always quite low in the first....unfortunately it's basically more of the same in the sequel...similar driving as expected, without any real graphical or performance upgrades. 

It's a shame, because the game could be great but 15-20 fps on an a7 chip is just not good enough.
Took long enough to update #1

Multiplayer needs work there is a lag during a race between people but overall really good game
